SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.* , ROWNUM AS rnum FROM ( SELECT a.cp_no , a.mem_id , a.cp_title , a.cp_content , TO_CHAR(cp_date,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS cp_date , a.cp_path , a.mem_name , a.cp_count FROM compages a , members b WHERE 1=1 AND a.mem_id = b.mem_id(+) AND a.del_yn = 'N'
ORDER BY cp_no DESC ) a ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM compages a , members b WHERE 1=1 AND del_yn = 'N' AND a.mem_id = b.mem_id(+)

SELECT a.cp_no , a.cp_title , a.mem_id , NVL(b.mem_name, '탈퇴한 회원') AS mem_name , a.cp_content , a.cp_path , TO_CHAR(cp_date,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS cp_date , a.cp_count FROM review a , members b WHERE 1=1 AND a.mem_id = b.mem_id(+) AND del_yn = 'N' AND cp_no = #{no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review( cp_no , mem_id , mem_name , cp_title , cp_content , cp_date , del_yn , cp_count , cp_path ) VALUES( (SELECT COUNT(*)+1 FROM compages) , #{memId} , #{memName} , #{cpTitle} , #{cpContent} , SYSDATE , 'N' , 0 , #{cpPath} )
mapper.update: UPDATE compages SET cp_count = cp_count + 1 WHERE 1=1 AND cp_no = #{no}
UPDATE compages SET del_yn = 'Y' WHERE 1=1 AND cp_no = #{cpNo}
